# cnp

Filename information for new link.

## Fields

- **vp**: File to link to.
- **dvp**: Directory in which to create the link.
- **ctx**: Context to authenticate for link request.

items.description: Directory in which to create the link.
items.name: dvp

items.description: Context to authenticate for link request.
items.name: ctx
